name: v1.19.2
body:
Version 1.19.2 (18/12/18)

- Fixed notification issue on Android Pie (9.0) with images
- New: share button from notification - now you can easily share the BitCoin evolution with everyone
- New: customize how much pools you would like to see on the pools chart & information screen
- New: fully customize the price from which getting notified when the BitCoin price is upper or lower than
- New: change application language to your preferred one
- Would you like to contribute with you own translations to your favourite language? Discover how at the application settings
- Maintenance and little bugs solved
 # Downloads [![BitCoinApp - Releases](https://img.shields.io/badge/Download%20-GitHub%20APK-blue.svg)](https://goo.gl/qeaU85)

name: v1.19.1
body:
Version 1.19.1 (03/12/18)

- Notification style reworked - now, an image is shown with the BitCoin evolution of the latest 7 days
- Minor bugs correction

name: v1.19
body:
Version 1.19 (09/11/18)

- App optimization - reduced size
- New options: now you can setup an interval for comparing data at BitCoin cards
- Migration to Android X: app faster and highly optimized
- Maintenance and bugs solved

name: v1.18.1
body: **Minor** release with some changes: + **Removed** PayPal button (Play Store policies). name: v1.15
body:
**BIG UPDATE WITH A LOT OF CHANGES**:
+ Included new options: **tab view** in main screen
+ Optimized code, application faster than ever
+ BitCoin information **in real time**
+ New charts, cards, and more
+ Added missing libraries in "License"
+ New dialogs, new styles, everything redefined
+ Solved bugs: now, devices with Android Lollipop can use this application (there was an error an sometimes latest version crashed)
+ And more…

name: v1.12
body:
With this new version, *lots of new features are in*:

+ **Background optimization**: at this version, the load charge has increased, so I *did my best* in order to optimize the application. For this purpose, I stablished all works in **async threads**, so the performance is not *completely affected*.

+ **Changelog** after updating: as in the [latest version](https://github.com/Javinator9889/BitCoinPools/releases/tag/1.1) I added support for *local downloading the newest version*, I decided to include a little changelog so the user is able to see what is new. Also, in **License**, this changelog is included.

+ **New license page**: as I am using a lot of libraries in order to develop this app, this libraries have *their license and version*, and as programmers, we must **acknowledge their work and merits**. So, if you access to *License* option, you will be able to see *all the libraries used* and their corresponding **GitHub pages**.

+ **Bugs and problems solved**: all detected bugs and problems where solved: now, when there is *no Internet connection*, you will not be able to use the app and **notifications service** will wait until network is available.

[![BitCoinApp - Aptiode](https://img.shields.io/badge/Download%20-Aptoide-green.svg)](https://goo.gl/5sqsNP)
[![BitCoinApp - Releases](https://img.shields.io/badge/Download%20-GitHub%20APK-blue.svg)](https://goo.gl/qeaU85)
